languages.text: "Не столь жестокую истину я желала узнать о собственном Доме..." {n}Кассия закрывает лицо руками, и вы чувствуете, как волны отчаяния исходят от ее тонкого тела, внезапно ставшего хрупким, словно стекло.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Не столь жестокую истину я желала узнать о собственном Доме..." {n}Кассия закрывает лицо руками, и вы чувствуете, как волны отчаяния исходят от ее тонкого тела, внезапно ставшего хрупким, словно стекло.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "I never wished to learn such harsh truths about my own House..." {n}Cassia buries her face in her hands and you feel waves of despair spreading from her lithe frame, which suddenly appears as fragile as glass.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Не столь жестокую истину я желала узнать о собственном Доме..." {n}Кассия закрывает лицо руками, и вы чувствуете, как волны отчаяния исходят от ее тонкого тела, внезапно ставшего хрупким, словно стекло.{/n}

traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「こんな辛い真実をわが家が秘めていたなんて、知りたくなかった…」{n}カシアは両手に顔をうずめる。あなたには、突然生じたガラスのような脆い絶望の波が、カシアのしなやかな体躯から広がるのが感じられる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I never wished to learn such harsh truths about my own House..." {n}Cassia buries her face in her hands and you feel waves of despair spreading from her lithe frame, which suddenly appears as fragile as glass.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「こんな辛い真実をわが家が秘めていたなんて、知りたくなかった…」{n}カシアは両手に顔をうずめる。あなたには、突然生じたガラスのような脆い絶望の波が、カシアのしなやかな体躯から広がるのが感じられる。{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “我从来没想过，我的家族的真相居然会如此残酷……”{n}卡西娅将脸埋在手里，你感觉绝望的波浪从她纤细的身体中不断蔓延，她似乎变得像玻璃一样脆弱。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I never wished to learn such harsh truths about my own House..." {n}Cassia buries her face in her hands and you feel waves of despair spreading from her lithe frame, which suddenly appears as fragile as glass.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我从来没想过，我的家族的真相居然会如此残酷……”{n}卡西娅将脸埋在手里，你感觉绝望的波浪从她纤细的身体中不断蔓延，她似乎变得像玻璃一样脆弱。{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « J'aurais préféré ne jamais savoir de quels crimes ma propre maison s'est rendue coupable... » {n}Cassia se cache le visage derrière les mains et vous sentez des vagues de désespoir émaner de son corps qui vous semble soudainement aussi fragile que du verre.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I never wished to learn such harsh truths about my own House..." {n}Cassia buries her face in her hands and you feel waves of despair spreading from her lithe frame, which suddenly appears as fragile as glass.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « J'aurais préféré ne jamais savoir de quels crimes ma propre maison s'est rendue coupable... » {n}Cassia se cache le visage derrière les mains et vous sentez des vagues de désespoir émaner de son corps qui vous semble soudainement aussi fragile que du verre.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «No deseaba descubrir unas verdades tan crueles sobre mi propia casa...». {n}Cassia entierra su rostro en las manos y sientes las oleadas de desesperación que despide su esbelta figura, ahora de apariencia tan frágil como el cristal.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I never wished to learn such harsh truths about my own House..." {n}Cassia buries her face in her hands and you feel waves of despair spreading from her lithe frame, which suddenly appears as fragile as glass.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «No deseaba descubrir unas verdades tan crueles sobre mi propia casa...». {n}Cassia entierra su rostro en las manos y sientes las oleadas de desesperación que despide su esbelta figura, ahora de apariencia tan frágil como el cristal.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Ich hatte nie gewünscht, solch grausame Wahrheiten über mein eigenes Haus zu erfahren ..." {n}Cassia vergräbt ihr Gesicht in den Händen, und du spürst Wellen der Verzweiflung von ihrer schlanken Gestalt ausgehen, die plötzlich zerbrechlich wie Glas wirkt.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I never wished to learn such harsh truths about my own House..." {n}Cassia buries her face in her hands and you feel waves of despair spreading from her lithe frame, which suddenly appears as fragile as glass.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ich hatte nie gewünscht, solch grausame Wahrheiten über mein eigenes Haus zu erfahren ..." {n}Cassia vergräbt ihr Gesicht in den Händen, und du spürst Wellen der Verzweiflung von ihrer schlanken Gestalt ausgehen, die plötzlich zerbrechlich wie Glas wirkt.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Hanem hakkında böylesine acı gerçekleri öğrenmeyi hiç istememiştim." {n}Cassia, yüzünü ellerine gömüyor. Bir anda cam kadar narin görünen kıvrak vücudundan umutsuzluk dalgalarının yayıldığını hissediyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I never wished to learn such harsh truths about my own House..." {n}Cassia buries her face in her hands and you feel waves of despair spreading from her lithe frame, which suddenly appears as fragile as glass.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Hanem hakkında böylesine acı gerçekleri öğrenmeyi hiç istememiştim..." {n}Cassia, yüzünü ellerine bastırıyor. Bir anda cam kadar narin görünen kıvrak vücudundan umutsuzluk dalgalarının yayıldığını hissedebiliyorsun.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
